name: search
author: Siemens Product Lifecycle Management Software Inc.

steps.condition: ((!ctx.showConfiguredRev && ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount >= 1 && !ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject ) || (!ctx.showConfiguredRev && ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount === 1 && ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject.uid === ctx.selected.uid ) || ( ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject && ctx.showConfiguredRev === 'true' && ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject.uid !== ctx.selected.uid ))

!((!ctx.showConfiguredRev && ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount >= 1 && !ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject ) || (!ctx.showConfiguredRev && ctx.pwaSelectionInfo.currentSelectedCount === 1 && ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject.uid === ctx.selected.uid ) || ( ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject && ctx.showConfiguredRev === 'true' && ctx.xrtSummaryContextObject.uid !== ctx.selected.uid ))

Awp0AddSearchFolderAccessorCommandCondit.expression: ctx.mselected.length > 0 && ctx.mselected[0] && ( ctx.mselected[0].type === 'TC_Project' || ctx.mselected[0].type === 'Group' || ctx.mselected[0].type === 'Role' || ctx.mselected[0].type === 'GroupMember' ) && !ctx.searchFolder.disableAddButton

Awp0RemoveSearchFolderAccessorCommandCon.expression: ctx.mselected.length > 0 && ctx.mselected[0] && ( ctx.mselected[0].type === 'TC_Project' || ctx.mselected[0].type === 'Group' || ctx.mselected[0].type === 'GroupMember' || ctx.mselected[0].type === 'User' || ctx.mselected[0].type === 'POM_accessor' ) && !ctx.searchFolder.disableRemoveButton && ctx.searchFolder.accessors && ctx.searchFolder.accessors.length > 0
